#summary A list of the currently available functions in Simplicity.

So far, these are the functions currently available in PSimplicity.

= Functions =
Listed approximately by their Scratch category. 
== Control ==
 * [draw draw()]
 * [setup setup()]
 * [stop stop()]
 * [keyPressed keyPressed()]
 * [update update()]
 * [if if()]
 * [ifelse if() else()]
 * [WaitSecs WaitSecs()]
 * [Stop Stop()]
 * [Exit Exit()]
 * [SendBroadcast Send()] (Broadcast)
 * [Received Received()] (Broadcast)
== Motion ==
 * [XPosition XPosition()]
 * [YPosition YPosition()]
 * [ChangeXBy ChangeXBy()]
 * [ChangeYBy ChangeYBy()]
 * [MoveSteps MoveSteps()]
 * [PointInDirection PointInDirection()]
 * [PointTowards PointTowards()]
 * [TurnCWDegrees TurnCWDegrees()]
 * [TurnCCWDegrees TurnCCWDegrees()]
 * [GoTo GoTo()]
 * [GlideTo GlideTo()]
 * [Direction Direction()]
== Looks ==

 * [CostumeNumber CostumeNumber()]
 * [Say Say()]
 * [SayForSecs SayForSecs()]
 * [Think Think()]
 * [ThinkForSecs ThinkForSecs()]
 * [ChangeSizeBy ChangeSizeBy()]
 * [SetSizeTo SetSizeTo()]
 * [Show Show()]
 * [Hide Hide()]
 * [Size Size()]

 * [SwitchToBackground SwitchToBackground()]
